name: Anime & Asian Media Hub (V2)
description: Curated sources specializing in Anime, Manga, Raw media, and broader East Asian content (Japanese/Chinese/Korean).
author: Kiyomi Anime Curators

providers.name: Nyaa (Anime/Asian Media)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Primary source for Eastern Asian media, often featuring raw or fan-subbed content.

providers.name: Anime Tosho (Torznab API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Automated service mirroring major anime torrents; provides structured Torznab data.

providers.name: ACG.RIP (Chinese Anime RSS)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Indexes Chinese and broader Asian media collections.

providers.name: Sukebei Nyaa (Adult)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Adults-only sister site of Nyaa, focused on 18+ Japanese/Asian media.

providers.name: Knaben (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern, fast search API that offers structured results.

providers.name: NekoBT (Private Torznab)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Specialized private anime indexer providing high-quality torrents via a Torznab API.

providers.name: Anirena
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Provides simple RSS search results primarily for anime content.

providers.name: AnimeTime
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: RSS feed focusing on dual-audio, multi-subbed anime releases.

providers.name: TokyoTosho
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General Eastern media index, including Anime, Manga, and non-video media.
providers.cautionReason: Non-video content (e.g., games, software, archives) may contain malware.

providers.name: Mikan Project (Anime)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Dedicated indexer for Japanese animation, known for fast release indexing.

providers.name: BTDigg
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Global search engine utilizing the DHT network; excellent for locating *older, large, or rare* Asian media archives.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: CloudTorrents (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern API-based indexer; useful for locating structured results when main Anime trackers fail.

providers.name: Snowfl
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General meta-search engine providing results from multiple sources; great for cross-checking niche Asian media titles.
providers.cautionReason: External meta-search results can be unverified.
